entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023
